subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ben Polland captured the 100th Metropolitan Open in a three-hole playoff against the 2011 champion, Tyler Hall, at Winged Foot Golf Club in Mamaroneck, N.Y.
snippet: Ben Polland captured the 100th Metropolitan Open in a three-hole playoff against the 2011 champion, Tyler Hall, at Winged Foot Golf Club in Mamaroneck, N.Y.
